mapper.select: select MAX(o.TASK_NO) from wf_task_info o where o.TASK_NO like CONCAT(#{taskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
mapper.insert:
insert into wf_task_info
select LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
mapper.select: select t1.* from wf_task_info t1 where t1.STATUS in ('1', '7', '8') and (t1.MEDIATION_NAME = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT} OR t1.NOW_LOAN_BANK = (select t2.PRIMARYDEPARTMENTID from ransomfloor_admin.tbl_user t2 WHERE t2.userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}) or t1.NOW_LOAN_BRANCHBANK = (select t3.PRIMARYDEPARTMENTID from ransomfloor_admin.tbl_user t3 WHERE t3.userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}))

select t1.* from wf_task_info t1 where t1.STATUS in ('2', '3', '4','5','6','9','10') and (t1.MEDIATION_NAME = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT} OR t1.NOW_LOAN_BANK = (select t2.PRIMARYDEPARTMENTID from ransomfloor_admin.tbl_user t2 WHERE t2.userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}) or t1.NOW_LOAN_BRANCHBANK = (select t3.PRIMARYDEPARTMENTID from ransomfloor_admin.tbl_user t3 WHERE t3.userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}))
